description: On the table in 15 minutes, this flavour-packed Chinese barbecue pork fried rice will truly hit the spot. Whip up this quick char siu pork bowl for dinner.
name: Quick Chinese BBQ Pork Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 560g Woolworths COOK Chinese BBQ style pork with char siu sauce
2 Odd Bunch carrots, peeled, thinly sliced diagonally

recipeInstructions.text: Heat pork in microwave following packet instructions. Remove pork from bag, discarding liquid, and transfer to a bowl. Using 2 forks, roughly shred pork. Stir in char siu sauce from packet.

Meanwhile, heat 2 tsp oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat. Swirl to coat. Add egg and swirl to coat. Cook for 1 minute or until just set. Transfer to a board and roll up. Stand for 1 minute, then thinly slice.

Heat remaining oil in wok or pan. Stirfry carrot, beans, garlic and ginger for 3 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add rice, soy and half of the onion, then stir-fry for 1 minute or until rice is heated through. Remove pan from heat.
Stir in shredded pork. Spoon fried rice into bowls. Top with egg and remaining onion.
